name: Artillery Bombardment
description: Deploy 3 Troops. For the next two turns, your Troops deal 2 damage each time a card played by your opponent resolves. Your opponent loses one queue slot next turn.

immediateEffect.script: if (!State.ContainsKey("troops")) State["troops"] = 0; State["troops"] = (int)State["troops"] + 3; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " calls in Artillery Bombardment! Deployed 3 troops, total: " + State["troops"]);

hooks.OnOpponentPlay: int troops = State.ContainsKey("troops") ? (int)State["troops"] : 0; int damage = troops * 2; DealDamage(Opponent, damage);
hooks.OnQueuePhaseStart: Battle.OpponentQueueSize -= 1; Log("Artillery suppresses the enemy! They lose a queue slot!");
